title: Bela Lugosi | White Zombie (1932) Colorized | Classic Horror Movie | Subtitled

sources.title: Bela Lugosi | White Zombie (1932) Colorized | Classic Horror Movie | Subtitled
sources.description:
Dug from the grave and put to work as slaves to murder!
Bela Lugosi plays Murder Legendre, a sinister voodoo master who turns a young woman into a zombie to serve his dark purposes. A young man, Neil, must confront Legendre and his undead minions to save his beloved from a fate worse than death.

Original title: White Zombie (1932) 


Black and white version: https://youtu.be/LN6bPy5JDhI

Director: Victor Halperin 
Writers: Garnett Weston, Garnett Weston 
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Madge Bellamy, Joseph Cawthorn
Genre: Classics, Cult Film, Crime, Horror, Sci-Fi 
Budget: $50,000


00:00 Full Movie.
02:03  A couple arrives in the West Indies and encounters zombies.
09:36  A man is deeply in love with a girl and is willing to sacrifice everything for her, but she is about to marry someone else.
24:53  A man discovers that his wife has been turned into a zombie and is being controlled by a voodoo master.
35:19  A preacher and his driver investigate the possibility of being buried alive in Haiti, encountering witch doctors and dark secrets along the way.
46:53  A man named Neil goes on a dangerous journey to find an old witch doctor named Pierre, who warns him about the land of the living dead and an evil spirit called Murder.
